name: Ngrok Indicator
description:
Panel indicator for ngrok status and active tunnels.

Features:
* Status badge in the top bar
* Active tunnels list (click to copy URL)
* Stop tunnels from the menu
* Start saved tunnels from ngrok.yml

Privacy/permissions:
* Clipboard: copies tunnel URLs only when you click a tunnel
* Network: may query https://api.ngrok.com/account from preferences when you provide an API key
